title: Inside Coronanomics: Eight ways the economy will never be the same again
description: Even after the crisis is contained, the global economy will never be the same, and neither will Australia's, writes Tim Harcourt. So how might the world change as a result of the pandemic, for the better and for worse?
content:
Posted 
April 01, 2020 05:00:58
This is the biggest global health pandemic in just over a century since the Spanish flu outbreak of 1918, just after the World War 1. 
Much of the media's interest has understandably been in the public health aspects of the … [+8159 chars]
